in anathuruwa je. aar. jayawardhana janadhipathithumagen pasuwa pathwu siyaluma lanka rajya nayakayinta indiyawata hisa namimata sidu wima awasanawata karunak.
ithin samajikayan kihipa denek eka ha samana balayen, sampath ha hamuda walin yuthu weddi meya aprayogika thathwayak bawata hareyi.

ema nisa amarikanu thanapathiwariya, nedarlantha thanapathiwariya, brithanya maha komasaris, jarman thanapathi, norwe thanapathi yana batahira koti denun ha koti pappala uthuru nagenahiratama duwamin pilyonwa, madakalapuwa nagaradhipathiniyawa ha karuna ammanwa, owunage nyaya pathrayata anuwa natana rukada bawata pariwarthanaya kara gannata darana uthsahayan dutuwada, ee desa hasyayen bala sitina thathwayakata apa pathwa sitin ne me suwisheshi pudgalaya hethuweni.

rangapannata athi aasawa nisa mama skrin testwalata sahabhagi wuna.

dawasa pura thama mithuran samaga ekwa bimathin sitina mema pudgalaya rakiyawa awasanwa niwasata paminena biriya samaga kalaha kara ganima dinapatha sidukarana athara ema awasthawala niwase sitina du daruwanta asabhya wachanayen bana wadi niwase bhandawalata alabhahani kirima sidukarana bawath pasugiyada da ese kalaha kara niwase muluthange upakarana saha shithakaranaya athulu bhanda siyallata gini thaba winasha kala bawath samiyage mema kriyawan nisa thama athulu daruwanta nidahase jiwath wimata nohakiwi athi bawath ema pudgalayage biriya wisin walipanna polisiyata paminili kara thibuni.
ema warada niwaradi kara ganimata ayata awasthawak uda wi athi athara wathman rajaye jathika sanhidiya yanthranaya kriyathmaka wanne hitapu janadhipathiniyage nayakathwaya yatathe ya.
sinhala lekhakayekuge hadima wangima pilibanda nandimitha්ra sapayana wistharaya hudek ohuge kathawa lesa nowa ek paramparawaka kathawa lesada kiyawiya hakiya.
mewan dawantha samuluwaka samarambhaka awasthawata ema wedikawata kisiwekuth balaporoththu nowunu kandayamak paminima me siyalla mese sidu wannata hethu wannata atha.

ithin nawatha warak mage hakiyawan gana balala mawa niwedana katayuthu sandaha yoda gaththa.
diyunu deshapalana sanskruthiyak nomathi ratawala prajathanthrawadi aayathanika wyuhaya thula da nawa aakarayakin prabhuwadaya ismathu wiya hakiya.
jathyantharawa sammathaya wu paya ate wada dinaya da mema nawa panatha magin ahosi kirimata salasum kara athi bawa wruththiya samithi penwa deyi.
